title: [v0.49.1] TypeError: Cannot convert undefined or null to object
body:
Installed the latest version 0.49.1. This release fixed #1587 but a new error raises now:

```shell
$ gulp js:build
[14:41:22] Using gulpfile C:\repo\belin\gulpfile.js
[14:41:22] Starting 'js:build'...
The final argument to magicString.overwrite(...) should be an options object. See https://github.com/rich-harris/magic-string
[14:41:30] 'js:build' errored after 8.37 s
[14:41:30] TypeError: Cannot convert undefined or null to object
    at Function.from (native)
    at Node.hasEffectsWhenMutated (C:\repo\belin\node_modules\rollup\dist\rollup.js:6885:10)
    at Node.hasEffectsWhenAssigned (C:\repo\belin\node_modules\rollup\dist\rollup.js:7148:22)
    at Node.hasEffects (C:\repo\belin\node_modules\rollup\dist\rollup.js:5979:51)
    at included.someChild.child (C:\repo\belin\node_modules\rollup\dist\rollup.js:5699:58)
    at keys.some.key (C:\repo\belin\node_modules\rollup\dist\rollup.js:5786:11)
    at Array.some (<anonymous>)
    at Node.someChild (C:\repo\belin\node_modules\rollup\dist\rollup.js:5779:20)
    at Node.hasEffects (C:\repo\belin\node_modules\rollup\dist\rollup.js:5699:32)
    at Node.shouldBeIncluded (C:\repo\belin\node_modules\rollup\dist\rollup.js:5775:15)
```

The Rollup plugins used:
- `rollup-plugin-node-resolve`: 3.0.0
- `rollup-plugin-commonjs`: 8.2.0

The Gulp task involved:

```javascript
gulp.task('js:build', async () => {
  let plugins = [
    nodeResolve(),
    commonjs()
  ];

  global._bundle = await rollup({
    cache: global._bundle,
    context: 'window',
    input: 'lib/client/index.js',
    plugins
  });

  return global._bundle.write({
    file: 'web/js/main.js',
    format: 'iife',
    sourcemap: true
  });
});
```

Even with the `magic-string` warning, this build task worked fine using Rollup v0.48.2.
